assets.name: Intro Cinematic
assets.reason: Contains human characters instead of anthropomorphic animals

prompt.scene: Opening cinematic - Finn leaving his village at dawn
prompt.setting: Small riverside hamlet with thatched-roof cottages, willow trees, morning mist on the water
prompt.action: Young otter warrior (Finn) says goodbye to elderly mouse couple, shoulders his pack, the Otterblade visible on his back. He walks toward the rising sun along a dirt path.
prompt.mood: Bittersweet departure, quiet determination, warmth of home left behind
prompt.camera: Start close on cottage door, pull back to reveal village, follow Finn as he walks away, end with wide shot of him on the path
prompt.audio: Soft orchestral, birdsong, flowing water, no dialogue

prompt.scene: Finn approaches Willowmere along the River Path
prompt.setting: Willow-lined river path, ancient stone walls of Willowmere visible in distance, afternoon light filtering through leaves
prompt.action: Finn walks purposefully along the path, occasionally glancing at the massive walls ahead. He pauses to touch a carved waystone.
prompt.mood: Anticipation, wonder at the ancient sanctuary, sense of destiny
prompt.camera: Track alongside Finn, reveal the Hearthhold walls gradually, end looking up at the gatehouse
prompt.audio: Flowing river, rustling leaves, distant bells

prompt.setting: Massive stone gatehouse with iron-banded doors, lanterns lit along the bridge, banners stirring in breeze
prompt.action: Finn crosses the old stone bridge, stops before the great doors. An elderly hedgehog gatekeeper peers through a window, then slowly opens the gate.
prompt.mood: Threshold moment, being tested and accepted, crossing into a new life
prompt.camera: Finn's POV crossing bridge, then reverse to see him framed in the gateway
prompt.audio: Creaking wood, chain mechanisms, welcoming warmth from within

prompt.scene: Entering the Great Hall and the Everember
prompt.setting: Vast hall with vaulted stone ceiling, the Everember hearth burning at center, tapestries on walls depicting woodland heroes
prompt.action: Finn enters the hall, overwhelmed by its grandeur. Elder badger in robes gestures to the Everember. Finn approaches the fire, feels its warmth.
prompt.mood: Awe, reverence, sense of ancient tradition, warmth conquering uncertainty
prompt.camera: Wide establishing shot, then Finn's face lit by firelight, finally close on the Everember flames
prompt.audio: Crackling fire, echoing footsteps, solemn choir undertone

prompt.setting: Towering bookshelves, dusty scrolls, candles and oil lamps, a great map table in the center
prompt.action: Finn climbs a spiral staircase into the Archives. An elderly owl librarian guides him to a specific scroll - the map showing Zephyros's approach.
prompt.mood: Mystery, discovery, the weight of ancient knowledge
prompt.camera: Spiral up with Finn, reveal the vast library, close on the map being unrolled
prompt.audio: Turning pages, quill scratching, soft hoot of owl

prompt.setting: Narrow stone stairs descending into darkness, torch sconces, roots breaking through ceiling, damp atmosphere
prompt.action: Finn takes a torch from a sconce, begins descent. Each step echoes. Something moves in the shadows below.
prompt.mood: Tense, claustrophobic, facing fear, determination overcoming dread
prompt.camera: Over-shoulder following Finn down, occasional glimpse of what lurks below
prompt.audio: Dripping water, distant rumbles, Finn's breathing

prompt.scene: Rallying allies in the Kitchen Gardens
prompt.setting: Sunlit courtyard with vegetable plots, herb spirals, training dummies, Hearthhold defenders gathering
prompt.action: Finn addresses a group of woodland creatures - mice, squirrels, a young badger. They look uncertain but inspired. Finn raises the Otterblade.
prompt.mood: Hope rising, community strength, preparing for battle together
prompt.camera: Start on worried faces, pan to Finn speaking, end with group raising weapons together
prompt.audio: Birdsong, armor clinking, rising orchestral swell

prompt.setting: Steep internal staircase, wind howling through arrow slits, storm clouds visible outside, ancient bronze bells above
prompt.action: Finn climbs against fierce wind. His cloak whips. He reaches the bell chamber, sees Galeborn crows circling outside.
prompt.camera: Vertigo-inducing climb, reveal of storm and enemies through windows
prompt.audio: Howling wind, distant thunder, clanging metal

prompt.scene: Facing Zephyros on the outer ramparts
prompt.setting: Storm-battered battlements, lightning illuminating massive storm hawk silhouette, ice forming on stones
prompt.action: Finn emerges onto the ramparts. Zephyros (enormous anthropomorphic hawk in frost-touched armor) lands before him. Their eyes meet - otter and hawk, warmth and cold.
prompt.mood: Epic confrontation, calm before the storm, destiny manifest
prompt.camera: Finn small against the storm, Zephyros descending, final shot of them facing each other
prompt.audio: Thunder, wind roar, silence as they face off

prompt.scene: Victory celebration at dawn in the Great Hall
prompt.setting: Great Hall filled with woodland creatures, Everember burning bright, dawn light streaming through windows, banners restored
prompt.action: Finn stands by the Everember, surrounded by friends. The elderly badger places a medallion around his neck. Creatures cheer. Finn looks at the fire, then at his companions, and smiles.
prompt.mood: Triumph, warmth, belonging, promise of peace, bittersweet joy
prompt.camera: Start on Everember, pull back to reveal celebration, end on Finn's face lit by dawn and firelight
prompt.audio: Joyful strings, cheering voices, crackling fire, birdsong of new dawn
